name: Killmer
description:
Become a journalist who researches old haunted places cases. The motel is haunted, strange things happen, you have to stay focused, you have to stay calm and not make noise. Headphone and dark room recommended

Is a horror game with a thrilling and strange story at the same time.

Here are the Minimum System Requirements (Minimum)
  • CPU: Intel Core i5-4460 clocked at 2.7GHz, AMD FX-6300 processor, or better
  • CPU SPEED: 2.7 GHz
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • VIDEO CARD: DX11 compatible or better
  • SOUND CARD: Yes
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 4 gb
  • or better. . .
